java/liquibase/change/DropNotNullConstraintChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase.AlterTableVisitor;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.SetNullableStatement;
00007 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00010 import liquibase.database.structure.Index;
00011 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00012 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00013 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00014 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00015 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00016 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00017 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00018 
00019 import java.util.ArrayList;
00020 import java.util.Arrays;
00021 import java.util.HashSet;
00022 import java.util.List;
00023 import java.util.Set;
00024 
00028 public class DropNotNullConstraintChange extends AbstractChange {
00029 
00030     private String schemaName;
00031     private String tableName;
00032     private String columnName;
00033     private String columnDataType;
00034 
00035 
00036     public DropNotNullConstraintChange() {
00037         super("dropNotNullConstraint", "Drop Not-Null Constraint");
00038     }
00039 
00040     public String getSchemaName() {
00041         return schemaName;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00045         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00046     }
00047 
00048     public String getTableName() {
00049         return tableName;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00053         this.tableName = tableName;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public String getColumnName() {
00057         return columnName;
00058     }
00059 
00060     public void setColumnName(String columnName) {
00061         this.columnName = columnName;
00062     }
00063 
00064     public String getColumnDataType() {
00065         return columnDataType;
00066     }
00067 
00068     public void setColumnDataType(String columnDataType) {
00069         this.columnDataType = columnDataType;
00070     }
00071 
00072     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00073         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tableName) == null) {
00074             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("tableName is required", this);
00075         }
00076         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(columnName) == null) {
00077             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("columnName is required", this);
00078         }
00079 
00080 
00081     }
00082 
00083     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00084         
00085         if (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) {
00086                 // return special statements for SQLite databases
00087                 return generateStatementsForSQLiteDatabase(database);
00088         } 
00089 
00090         return new SqlStatement[] { new SetNullableStatement(
00091                         getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), 
00092                         getTableName(), getColumnName(), getColumnDataType(), true) 
00093         };
00094     }
00095     
00096     private SqlStatement[] generateStatementsForSQLiteDatabase(Database database) 
00097                         throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00098         // SQLite does not support this ALTER TABLE operation until now.
00099                 // For more information see: http://www.sqlite.org/omitted.html.
00100                 // This is a small work around...
00101                 
00102         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00103         
00104                 // define alter table logic
00105                 AlterTableVisitor rename_alter_visitor = new AlterTableVisitor() {
00106                         public ColumnConfig[] getColumnsToAdd() {
00107                                 return new ColumnConfig[0];
00108                         }
00109                         public boolean copyThisColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00110                                 return true;
00111                         }
00112                         public boolean createThisColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00113                                 if (column.getName().equals(getColumnName())) {
00114                                         column.getConstraints().setNullable(true);
00115                                 }
00116                                 return true;
00117                         }
00118                         public boolean createThisIndex(Index index) {
00119                                 return true;
00120                         }
00121                 };
00122                 
00123         try {
00124                 // alter table
00125                         statements.addAll(SQLiteDatabase.getAlterTableStatements(
00126                                         rename_alter_visitor,
00127                                         database,getSchemaName(),getTableName()));
00128                 } catch (JDBCException e) {
00129                         e.printStackTrace();
00130                 }
00131                 return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);         
00132     }
00133 
00134     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00135         AddNotNullConstraintChange inverse = new AddNotNullConstraintChange();
00136         inverse.setColumnName(getColumnName());
00137         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00138         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00139         inverse.setColumnDataType(getColumnDataType());
00140 
00141         return new Change[]{
00142                 inverse
00143         };
00144     }
00145 
00146     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00147         return "Null constraint dropped from " + getTableName() + "." + getColumnName();
00148     }
00149 
00150     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00151         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("dropNotNullConstraint");
00152         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00153             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00154         }
00155 
00156         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00157         element.setAttribute("columnName", getColumnName());
00158         return element;
00159     }
00160 
00161     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00162 
00163         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00164 
00165         Column column = new Column();
00166         column.setTable(table);
00167         column.setName(columnName);
00168 
00169 
00170         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(table, column));
00171     }
00172 }
